description: Erection of hip to gable roof extension, rear dormer roof extension incorporating juliet balcony and installation of two front rooflights and one rear rooflight to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B & C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015.

The assessment of this application has been based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.

I acknowledge receipt of your payment for £206.00, as this application is for converting existing semi detached house into a 3 self-contained flats  the fee required for this application is £924.00, therefore please forward the outstanding balance of £718.00 as soon as possible.Note: Payment can be made via either our Contact Centre on 0208 547 5002, by cheque made payable to Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames or online via the Kingston council website.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Acceptable and necessary repeat works to remove pollard regrowth in the interests of health and safety.Recommendation:No objections.
